entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
